originalText.text: I couldn't recommend One Love Band more highly...they were INCREDIBLE at our wedding! Melissa and Eric were a dream to work with throughout the whole process, and the full band was so talented, energetic, and fun! We were especially grateful that they learned and played our first dance song exactly like the recording, since we had fairly complex choreography. They learned and played multiple songs just for us, including for parent dances and our ceremony music -- they are so committed to making your wedding entertainment fully personalized and exactly what you envision. Multiple guests at our wedding told us during and after the party that they were the best wedding band they had ever heard/seen! Absolutely book One Love Band if you want to have the fun and memorable wedding of your dreams!

originalText.text: Hands down the best wedding band of all time. Eric, Melissa, and everyone at One Love are the best in the business. Eric truly has a superpower to curate a living playlist that energizes the party and hits on every emotion throughout the evening. I’m so happy that we had them play at our wedding. Our guests were in awe on how electric the band and dance were was all night.

originalText.text:
We had such a positive experience with Eric Nicolas and One Love! They truly went above and beyond to create a personalized and memorable wedding experience for us and your guests.

It's important to find a band that is easy to work with and able to cater to your specific preferences, and One Love was able to do just that. The fact that our guests are still raving about the music they played is a testament to their talent and the impact they had on our big day.

This band was the perfect choice for our wedding and we felt like they were family throughout the process and on our wedding. If you're looking for a band that will make your wedding truly unique and unforgettable, we would highly recommend this operation.

originalText.text:
Private residence, Newport, RI, 8-19-23
You guys were amazing. From the Janis Joplin early on in the evening we knew we were in for a treat and that kept going all the way to Proud Mary at the close with tons of Phish and Dead, per our request, in between. At least thirty people came up to me personally last night to tell me how awesome they thought you were and how much they loved the setlists and about as many instagram posts and texts the day after said the same and they keep rolling in. From the start, you were great to work with and have amazing range, and, of course, we especially appreciate you working out how my wife and I could  join you to perform our first song on stage before we moved to the dance floor. Everyone had an amazing night and you kept the party moving with great energy the whole time. Thank you from a very happy bride and groom.

originalText.text: One Love is the best wedding band we could have asked for! We had our wedding at Bryant Park Grill in May 2022 and selected the 8 piece band package with horns. One Love was super communicative throughout the process as well as working with Linda & Tom at BPG. Eric played beautiful Beatles instrumentals throughout our ceremony and we had a jazz trio for our cocktail hour. The band has incredible range and can prepare special songs on your request. We had multiple guests after our wedding ask who the band was so they could recommend for friend and family member's weddings because the dance floor was out of control! Thank you One Love for being the absolute best.
